main_definition: Individuals engaged in labor or employment to perform tasks, usually within a specific industry or field.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People employed for manual labor or skilled trades
meanings_and_examples.example: Construction workers building a new bridge

meanings_and_examples.definition: Employees in any given profession, industry, or sector
meanings_and_examples.example: Teachers and school staff at an elementary school

meanings_and_examples.definition: Persons who perform tasks for wages or salaries
Group of individuals engaged in producing goods and services
meanings_and_examples.example: Assembly line workers manufacturing cars in an automobile factory
